content: the cherish hat is a free crochet pattern on my blog this simple crochet hat is made from a rectangle using a crochet stitch that looks like knit this easy crochet hat uses just one stitch to create an interesting knit-like texture if you love warm cozy and chunky crochet hats this one would be perfect great for everyone in the family - so easy to customize to any size the simple crochet stitch is a simple double slip_stitch worked in a different placement than usual creating a knit like appearance and texture i have a complete stitch tutorial to help you with this brioche knit-like crochet stitch i also have a tutorial to help with seaming and cinching top of hat closed as well a quick and easy bulky hat perfect for wearing or gifts
